results.transliteration_ground_truth: l ṯfl bn frʾ bn frd w qbr bny -h b h- mẓr
results.translation_ground_truth: By Ṯfl son of Frʾ son of Frd and he buried his sons at the lookout point.

description.prompt:
Describe what you see in this image in detail. 
Focus on any text, inscriptions, or writing visible on the stone surface.
description.response: The image depicts a large, dark gray rock with a rough texture, featuring a prominent scratch mark in the center. The rock is situated amidst other rocks, with a bright white background suggesting a sunny day. The scratch mark appears to be a deliberate carving, possibly created by a tool or object. The surrounding rocks are also rough and gray, with some displaying cracks or fissures. The overall atmosphere of the image is one of ruggedness and natural beauty, with the scratch mark adding a sense of human presence to the otherwise barren landscape.
